channel.title: Getting a static ip?
channel.description:
I havn't been able to figure out the whole Static IP bit and I was also wondering how you get your server to run off of Hamachi. If anyone could help me, I would appreciate it much.
Also, my MSN is Ozzy_Ozbourn@hotmail.com, but I'm at school right now and I won't be home for an hour and a half from when I post this so. Anyways, I would appreciate it very much if you helped me.
Thanks.

item.title: Getting a static ip?
item.dc:creator: @hulkman68 hulkman68
item.description:
@hulkman68 wrote:

get no-ip nd do what other guides say,go off of them we u made a host nd open duc programm.click options,then connection then tick the boxes click the arrow on both options then click hamahci network referance.then edit host on no-ip site o ur hamachi ip. crongratz u have u server with a static ip

Read full topic
